nodes.title: Fix Ecosystem CI workflow
Upgrade to Quarkus 2.2.0.Final
Add integration tests with DSE
Warn users when Quarkus main event loop is too small
Ability to specify container image and startup options in integration tests (fixes #192)
Ability to configure listeners from Quarkus configuration (fixes #182)
Upgrade test infra to use Cassandra 4.0
Include application.conf in the native image (fixes #188)
Reactive "if not exists" insertion does not work (fixes #183)
Upgrade to Quarkus 2.1.0.Final (fixes #184)
Make application.conf and custom LBP available in native mode
Upgrade to Quarkus 2.0.0.Final
Do not reference MutinyResultProducerService directly (fixes #178)
ClassNotFoundException when com.datastax.oss:java-driver-mapper-runtime
Upgrade to Quarkus 2.0 (fixes #172)
Register MutinyResultProducerService as ServiceProviderBuildItem (fixes #174)
Use Thread context class loader in QuarkusDriverContext (fixes #171)
Use proper branch for Quarkus Ecosystem-CI
Update to Quarkus 1.13.0.Final
Don't include Quarkus BOM in the extension BOM
Fix GraalVM version in Jenkinsfile
Enable most useful metrics by default (fixes #164)
Merge runtime and deployment boms (fixes #162)
Adapt Quarkus Cassandra metrics to JAVA-2872 (fixes #160)
Make Tinkerpop truly optional (fixes #146)
Register DefaultMetricsFactory for reflection when metrics disabled (fixes #157)
JAVA-2735: Exclude generated classes from the JaCoCo report (fixes #39)
Eager mapper and DAO initialization at startup (fixes #112)
Automatic mapper and DAO detection and registration (fixes #113)
Remove usages of deprecated goal native-image
Add support for Micrometer (fixes #150)
Quickstart enhancements
Prevent eager init from making the application unresponsive (fixes #144)
Replace references to Capabilities.METRICS by MetricsCapabilityBuildItem
Upgrade driver to 4.10.0
Fix broken cql snippet in quickstart guide
Use driver's own MicroProfileMetricsFactory
Upgrade metrics integration to incorporate changes from JAVA-2808 (fixes #117)
Increase version of datastax/driver-java to 4.9 (fixes #123)
Upgrade quarkus.version to 1.7.1 (fixes #128)
Use a composite loader to inject Quarkus properties into the driver configuration (fixes #75)
Enable SSL support (fixes #111)
Provide a lazy wrapper for QuarkusCqlSession (fixes #106)
issue-125: Don't call close() if session wasn't initialized
Avoid implementing Multi and extend AbstractMulti instead
doc url typo
small-rye metrics should not be optional
Simplify quickstart, use session keyspace in daos
Add more configuration settings (fixes #72, fixes #105)
Adds docker host to test resource
Exclude Groovy jars when importing the driver (fixes #101)
Trigger eager session initialization at startup (fixes #99)
Remove injection in CassandraMetricsIT (fixes #96)
Add setting for DataStax Astra secure connect bundle (fixes #94)
Enforce guidelines on test method names
create a test-framework module
issue84 Add a no-arg constructor to QuarkusCqlSessionBuilder
issue80 - Simplify configuration properties
Cleanup POM files
Register for reflection for AuthProviders and SSLFactories
issue70 - Clarify usage of log frameworks
issue59 - Create automated performance tests for the extension
Upgrade to Java driver 4.7.0 as released
add configuration for username and password
quarkus-69 remove RuntimeInitializedClassBuildItem for MetricRegistry
22: cassandra-quarkus fixes once we get a driver with JAVA-2663
JAVA-2791: Add IT test to the quickstart project
JAVA-2761  Improve in-tree documentation
JAVA-2767 Change the data-model in quickstart to use storeId instead of id
JAVA-2778: Split classes into api and internal packages
JAVA-2722: Replace generated code in CassandraClientProcessor by normal java class
Validate that cassandra-quarkus/runtime module does not have a dependency to quarkus-core-deployment
Increment quarkus version to 1.5.0.Final
JAVA-2719: Integrate with Netty event loop provided by Quarkus
JAVA-2782: Substitution to fix warning re: Guava's UnsignedBytes impl
JAVA-2782: Native substitution fixes + driver (re)upgrade
Java2754 object mapper reactive
JAVA-2782: Add substitutions to make Guava more Graal-friendly
JAVA-2776: Integration test fix for test failures on quarkus-ecosystem-ci
JAVA-2775: Fixes for quarkus-ecosystem-ci test failures
JAVA-2754: Integration between Driver reactive API and Quarkus
JAVA-2745: Repo-side support for necessary workflows
JAVA-2684: Add documentation and examples of Quarkus Cassandra extension
JAVA-2683: Create a Quarkus Cassandra quick starter
JAVA-2736: Speed up TestContainers startup time
JAVA-2707: Substitute optional dependencies with Quarkus Substitiution
JAVA-2738 IllegalAccessException in CassandraClientProducer when creating new Quarkus app + C* extension
